entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:14 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 6:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: W 19 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries at times heavy. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
